Catalano.MachineLearning

Class ConfusionMatrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • Catalano.MachineLearning.ConfusionMatrix

  • public class ConfusionMatrix
extends java.lang.Object
    Confusion matrix. In the field of machine learning, a confusion matrix, also known as a contingency table or an error matrix, is a specific table layout that allows visualization of the performance of an algorithm, typically a supervised learning.
